name: Time You Enjoy Wasting
description: "Was that tweet about me?" "They don't actually like me." "What if I just jumped out of the car right now?" No matter where you go, these thoughts are always with you. It usually passes but what happens when it doesn't? What happens when all you want to do is enjoy yourself, but it's impossible to think about anything else?  Explore and traverse the world as you seek out relief from your thoughts embracing any and all distractions.
